PageTitle: display bgp vpnv4 all peer verbose
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 all peer verbose command displays detailed information about BGP peers in the BGP-VPNv4 address family. The display bgp vpnv4 all peer verbose command displays detailed information about BGP peers in the BGP-VPNv4 address family.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 all peer [ <ipv4-address> ] verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specify an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a BGP multi-instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without any spaces. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 all peer verbose
